title: Tab Switch
infoOpen: When activated, other open tabs will be closed automatically.

toastNotInstalled.title: Install the extension!
toastNotInstalled.description: You need to install the extension to use this feature.

toastLeastOneTab.title: Please add at least two tabs!
toastLeastOneTab.description: You need to add at least two tabs to start automatic rotation.

toastImportError.title: Import failed
toastImportError.description: The selected file is invalid or corrupted.

errorBoundary.title: Something went wrong
errorBoundary.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or reload the page.

toastSaveSuccess.title: Tab saved
toastSaveSuccess.description: The tab has been saved successfully.

toastSaveError.title: Save failed
toastSaveError.description: An error occurred while saving the tab. Please try again.

toastLoadError.title: Load failed
toastLoadError.description: An error occurred while loading tabs. Please try again.

toastDeleteError.title: Delete failed
toastDeleteError.description: An error occurred while deleting the tab. Please try again.

toastReorderError.title: Reorder failed
toastReorderError.description: An error occurred while reordering tabs. Please try again.

toastSwitchError.title: Switch failed
toastSwitchError.description: An error occurred while changing the switch state. Please try again.
